meanings.definition: A flat or curved component, typically rectangular, that forms or is set into the surface of a door, wall, or ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The panels on the door were painted blue.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design on the wall panels.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the door panels.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a blank canvas, waiting for ideas to fill its panels.
meanings.sent5: The panels of the ceiling gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A group of people gathered to discuss a topic or make decisions.
meanings.sent1: The panels of experts debated the best course of action.
meanings.sent2: The school board panels met to plan the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The panels of friends argued playfully about their favorite movie.
meanings.sent4: Their unity made them a strong panel, able to face any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The diverse panel shared unique perspectives on the issue.

meanings.definition: A group of people selected to serve as jurors in a trial.
meanings.sent1: The panels of jurors listened attentively to the witness.
meanings.sent2: Being part of the jury panel required a sense of responsibility.
meanings.sent3: The panel of jurors chuckled at the lawyer's joke.
meanings.sent4: Each juror was a vital piece of the decision-making panel.
meanings.sent5: The diverse panel of jurors ensured a fair trial process.
